Company: All Talentz
Website: https://alltalentz.com

All Talentz is a global outsourcing company and remote staffing partner that connects businesses in the United States, Canada, and Europe with highly skilled professionals.

We specialize in outsourcing talent â€” providing dedicated remote employees who work as integrated members of your team.

As an outsourcing company, we support industries including:
- Property insurance and restoration
- Healthcare and medical billing
- Technology and IT
- Finance and accounting
- Operations and administrative support

Core Services:
- Restoration estimators
- Medical billing specialists
- Software developers
- UI/UX designers
- IT support specialists
- Digital marketing specialists
- Accountants & finance professionals
- Administrative support
- Account receivables specialists
- Bookkeeping specialists
- Virtual Assistants

Businesses partner with All Talentz to:
- Reduce hiring costs by up to 70%
- Scale without increasing local payroll overhead
- Access pre-vetted, trained, and supported remote professionals
- Combine human expertise with technology-enabled systems

Primary markets served:
- United States
- Canada
- Europe

Value Proposition:
- Up to 70% cost savings
- Fully managed remote employees
- Performance oversight
- Structured onboarding
- Continuous training

Mission:
Restoring excellence globally.
